definition: the whole journey/all the way/going the same way/going in the same direction/of the same kind
on the road/on a journey/road surface
itinerary/route/political line (e.g. right revisionist road)/CL:條|条[tiao2]

sentences.english: The road winds through the forest.
The thief had run more than forty miles.
sentences.chinese: 那個小偷已經跑了四十多里路。

sentences.english: A new type of two-branch diversity reception system is presented.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一種新的兩支路分集接收系統。

sentences.english: Turn right onto Ford Road and take the first street on your left.
sentences.chinese: 右轉到福特路，然後第一條街左轉。

sentences.english: Allow plenty of time for this deceptively short journey.
sentences.chinese: 有大把時間享受這一短暫的迷幻之路。

sentences.english: There is nothing like a long walk to arouse the appetite.
sentences.chinese: 沒有什麼比走很長的路更能激起食慾的了。

sentences.english: The guide misled the tourists in the woods.
sentences.chinese: 嚮導在森林裏給旅遊者帶錯了路。

sentences.english: You are my life away a never-ending road.
sentences.chinese: 你是我一生走不完的路。

sentences.english: Hence, this road is also known as the Path of Lilac.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這條路也被稱爲路徑的淡紫色。

sentences.english: Voluntary workers built a road to the boy's camp.
sentences.chinese: 自願的工人建了一條路，通到男孩子們的營地。

sentences.english: She saw the light burning and ran the rest of the way to her house.
sentences.chinese: 她看到點亮的燈光，跑完了剩下的路到了家。

sentences.english: It seemed like a long ascent to the top.
sentences.chinese: 登上山頂的路好長好長。

sentences.english: There is a tree every few meters on either side of the road .
sentences.chinese: 路的兩邊每隔幾米就有一棵樹。

sentences.english: Duolun Road, formerly named Darroch Road, is a little street in Hongkou District of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 多倫路，原名竇樂安路，是上海虹口區的一條小街。

sentences.english: One stretch of the road was unlit, so we had to cycle in the dark.
sentences.chinese: 有段路沒有路燈，我們就只能摸黑前進。

definition: to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)
on the road/on a journey/road surface
broad and open road (idiom); fig. brilliant future prospects
(lit.) the road through Yangguan 陽關|阳关[Yang2 guan1]/(fig.) wide open road/bright future
the whole journey/all the way/going the same way/going in the same direction/of the same kind
itinerary/route/political line (e.g. right revisionist road)/CL:條|条[tiao2]
